greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A080791(A245611(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: a(1) = 0, a(2) = 1, for n > 2, a(n) = a(A285712(n)) + [n ≡ 2 mod 3]. (Where [] is Iverson bracket, giving here 1 only if n is of the form 3k+2, and 0 otherwise.)
xref: One less than A091304 after the initial term.
Cf. A006254 (gives the positions of zeros after initial a(1)=0.)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 25 2017
